item.title: My Experience With Antivirus on Linux
item.author: tahoso@likely.blue (Tahoso)
item.description:
My Experience With Antivirus on Linux

Author: Tahoso(tahoso@likely.blue)

So I installed Anti-Virus software on my Linux system, and the reason behind it is pretty simple: I was bored. Yea! In my opinion, there is no better reason than that. I wanted to have fun tinkering with something, and AV seemed like a good idea at the time. I don’t think everyone on Linux needs to have AV, and in fact, I believe it’s quite useless on Linux for now. If you’re interested in learning more about the subject(AV), you can visit this blog. For me, this was just for testing and learning purposes.
